entry.title: Elon Musk Predicts 'Catastrophic Outcome' Without AI Regulation
entry.summary: Elon Musk is warning again that unchecked development of artificial intelligence can lead to a "catastrophic outcome" for humanity.

entry.title: The Weeknd and Binance Enter the Metaverse
entry.summary: The digital experience arrives amid The Weeknd's Binance-sponsored, "crypto-powered" world tour, which is currently in Europe.

entry.title: Bakkt to Delist Solana, Cardano and Polygon Following SEC Lawsuits
entry.summary: The publicly-listed company is waiting for further regulatory clarity.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey Pledges $5M to Help Bitcoin Core Developers
entry.summary: The funding will come from his charity, Start Small, and will be disbursed $1 million at a time over the next five years.

entry.title: French Authorities Investigating Binance for ‘Aggravated Money Laundering’
entry.summary: France’s financial judicial investigation service is reportedly investigating Binance for offenses including “aggravated money laundering.”

entry.title: Binance to Leave Netherlands After Failing to Acquire VASP License
entry.summary: The world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange today announced the termination of its operations in the Netherlands.

entry.title: FDIC Targets Crypto Exchange OKCoin Over ‘False’ Insurance Assertions
entry.summary: The U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation has warned OKCoin over “misleading” claims on its website implying FDIC account protection.

entry.title: French Crypto Entrepreneur Hasheur: U.S. Crackdown Chance for EU, Asia to 'Capture' Volume
entry.summary: Owen Simonin, aka Hasheur, spoke to Decrypt at the Proof-of-Talk conference about the U.S. crypto crackdown—and the opportunity it presents.

entry.title: A Brief History of Artificial Intelligence (AI): From Turing to IoT
entry.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) as a concept dates back to ancient times, but modern AI began in the mid-20th century with pioneers like Alan Turing.

entry.title: Mercedes-Benz Is Adding ChatGPT to Cars for AI Voice Commands
entry.summary: The luxury automaker is set to integrate OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot into its Mercedes-Benz User Experience (MBUX) feature in the U.S.

entry.title: BlockFi Sues State Commission for Not Accepting Its Surrendered License
entry.summary: The bankrupt crypto exchange wants to surrender its license, but regulators are insisting on what BlockFi says would be an expensive court proceeding.

entry.title: Alchemy's ChatGPT Plugin Enables Easier Blockchain Analysis Via AI
entry.summary: Alchemy’s new GPT-4 plugin harnesses the power of AI to deliver user-friendly, real-time blockchain analysis.

entry.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead
entry.summary: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.

entry.title: Banned In New York, CoinEx Returns $1.7 Million to Settle Lawsuit
entry.summary: New York Attorney General Letitia James announced a $1.7 million settlement with Hong Kong-based CoinEx over securities violations.

entry.title: Prometheum: What You Need to Know About the SEC’s Poster Child for Crypto Compliance
entry.summary: Prometheum's co-CEO gave remarks on Capitol Hill that mirrored the SEC's stance. Now industry observers are poring over the startup’s paper trail.

entry.title: Twitch's New Favorite Game 'Only Up' Is Loaded With Goblintown NFT Art
entry.summary: More than 100,000 simultaneous viewers watched streamers play clumsy climbing game Only Up, which is packed with Goblintown references.

entry.title: BlackRock Files Bitcoin ETF Application With the SEC
entry.summary: BlackRock, with Coinbase as its partner, has submitted an application for a spot Bitcoin ETF following a Thursday morning report.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey's Block Bitcoin Wallet Opens Beta, Announces Coinbase Support
entry.summary: Bitkey will allow beta users to withdraw Bitcoin from Coinbase and Cashapp using "copy and paste."

entry.title: NFT Artwork Owned by Three Arrows Capital Sells for $6.2 Million at Sotheby's
entry.summary: Ringers #879, a.k.a. "The Goose," sold for over $6.2 million with fees at today's Sotheby's Grails: Part II live auction.

entry.title: As Crypto Burned Stateside, NFT Believers Partied Through the Night in Lisbon
entry.summary: The SEC's actions against the largest crypto exchanges were barely a footnote during the NFT extravaganza at NFC Lisbon in Portugal.

entry.title: Former FTX Ventures Head Amy Wu Turns to AI After Being 'Duped' by SBF
entry.summary: Despite a dark episode at FTX Ventures, Wu has now joined Menlo Ventures to help spearhead its investments in AI and consumer tech.

entry.title: Colombia’s Central Bank Taps Ripple to Pilot CBDC
entry.summary: Colombia already makes use of Ripple's technology for land distribution efforts in the country.

entry.title: Ethereum Devs Cry Foul on Uniswap v4 'Open Source' Promises
entry.summary: There's a few licenses that Ethereum devs consider the mark of a truly open source project. The one Uniswap chose for its v4 isn't one of them.

entry.title: AMD Debuts AI Chip to Challenge Nvidia
entry.summary: The company's new MI300X AI Chip will be a direct competitor to the dominance of Nvidia's H100.

entry.title: Crypto Heads East as Huobi HK Launches Trading Service in Hong Kong
entry.summary: Huobi has joined the Hong Kong Virtual Assets Consortium (HKVAC), while its Hong Kong arm now offers crypto spot trading and virtual asset custody.

entry.title: Bitcoin Whale Moves $1.2 Million After 13 Years of Inactivity
entry.summary: Some long-term investors are moving their stashes after years of remaining dormant.

entry.title: Arbitrum's New 'Layer-3' Xai Network Is Built to Power Web3 Games
entry.summary: Dedicated gaming network Xai is launching with support from Offchain Labs, with games like Final Form and LAMOverse up first.

entry.title: Fedi's Bitcoin Federations Could Onboard Next 1 Billion Users, Says CEO
entry.summary: Fedi CEO Obi Nwosu has big plans for kickstarting Bitcoin adoption via a unique, Lightning-powered community app called "Federations."

entry.title: Cyber Criminals Are Turning to Crypto Mining Pools to Wash Ill-Gotten Funds: Chainalysis
entry.summary: Ransomware actors are increasingly trying to pass off their own funds as proceeds received from cryptocurrency mining, claims Chainalysis.

entry.title: Will Artificial Intelligence (AI) Take Over Your Job?
entry.summary: Jobs requiring human ingenuity or creativity, or which rely heavily on social and emotional skills, might be the safest.

entry.title: Ethereum, Cardano, and Dogecoin Lead Weekly Crypto Losses
entry.summary: After the largest altcoins, Bitcoin is also shedding value as the crypto market continues to digest yesterday’s fed notes.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Trial Can Proceed on Original Charges Only, Says DoJ
entry.summary: The Government is willing to wait a bit longer to try the FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried on several additional counts.

entry.title: Tether CTO Says 'Let Them Come' as Stablecoin's Dollar Peg Wobbles
entry.summary: With the market's largest stablecoin waffling, the Tether CTO took to Twitter to assure investors that redemptions won't be a problem.

entry.title: Take AI Warnings Seriously, Says UN Secretary-General
entry.summary: The official called for the creation of something akin to the International Atomic Energy Agency to regulate AI tech.

entry.title: Republicans Continue to Defend Crypto in Latest Letter to SEC
entry.summary: House Financial Services Committee leaders warned that the SEC’s suggested new definition of “exchange” would hurt innovation.

entry.title: 'Bad Like Brooklyn Dancehall' Brings Shaggy and Jamaican Culture to Tribeca
entry.summary: The documentary, executive produced by musician Shaggy, debuted at the Tribeca Film Festival with help from Decentralized Pictures.

entry.title: AI Gold Rush: Generative AI Poised to Pump $4.4 Trillion Into Global Economy Annually
entry.summary: Generative AI could be a major player in the AI industry as a whole, which could be worth $15.7 trillion by 2030.

entry.title: Miami's 'Bitcoin Mayor' Will Challenge Donald Trump for US President
entry.summary: Francis X. Suarez has been an outspoken advocate of cryptocurrency since taking office in 2017.

entry.title: Crypto Leaders Praise Draft GOP Bill, Dems Raise Concerns
entry.summary: Congress invited crypto executives to testify on a bill that some say may undermine the SEC

entry.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan
entry.summary: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.

entry.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.

entry.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit
entry.summary: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.

entry.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO
entry.summary: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.

entry.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO
entry.summary: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.

entry.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming
entry.summary: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.

entry.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP
entry.summary: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.

entry.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG
entry.summary: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.

entry.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth
entry.summary: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.

entry.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset
entry.summary: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.

entry.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil
entry.summary: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel
entry.summary: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.

entry.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Super-fan Base’: Superduper Co-founder
entry.summary: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand Superduper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.

entry.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs
entry.summary: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.

entry.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap
entry.summary: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.

entry.title: Why 'Words With Friends' Creator Paul Bettner is 'Allergic' to Pay-to-Win NFTs
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on what to do when NFTs become in-game characters and assets.

entry.title: Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan: 18 Months is 'Several Decades' in Crypto
entry.summary: Fractal and Twitch co-founder Justin Kan gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin an update on all things Fractal and his perspective on blockchain technology in gaming.

entry.title: Playing for Money in Web3 Games Not 'Durable,' Says Fractal's Justin Kan
entry.summary: Twitch and Fractal co-founder Justin Kan and Fractal co-founder Dan Borstelmann share their perspectives on Web3 gaming's changing landscape with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: From Cyber Cafe to Web3: How Everquest Dev Jeffrey Butler Got Into Game Development
entry.summary: Everquest developer turned Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he got into game development.
